name: Emma
slogan: Empowering people to live a better and more fulfilling financial life
description:
Emma is your financial advocate. Our mission is to empower millions of people to live a better and more fulfilling financial life.

Emma was founded by engineers, who are extremely focused on coding, product and data. These are the three pillars on which we want to build a strong tech culture and fix personal finance once for all.

We have recently closed a seed round with Kima Ventures, one of the first in Transferwise, and Agla√© Ventures, early stage fund of the Groupe Arnault, investor in Netflix and Airbnb. Alongside them, several angel investors, who have built and sold industry leading companies have decided to take part into this journey.

TechCrunch: https://techcrunch.com/2018/10/18/emma-crypto/
Financial Times: https://www.ft.com/savingapps
CityAM: http://www.cityam.com/266389/emma-banking-app-millennials-gets-fca-approval-and

Join our community: https://community.emma-app.com/

team.title: CTO
team.name: Antonio Marino
team.bioHtml: CTO / Founder at Emma. Formerly @Google and @CERN. Computer Science @University of Manchester.

team.title: Co-founder & CEO
team.name: Edoardo Moreni
team.bioHtml: Co-Founder and CEO @ Emma. We are hiring!

team.title: Customer Success
team.name: Joel O'Rourke
team.bioHtml: Previously an Onboarding Success Manager at a SaaS startup. Results orientated with a passion for people and systems

jobs.title: Senior Backend Engineer (Node.JS)
jobs.description:
Emma is your best financial friend. Our mission is to empower millions of people to live a better and more fulfilling financial life. 

Emma was founded by engineers, who are extremely focused on coding, product and data. These are the three pillars on which we want to build a strong tech culture and fix personal finance once for all. üí™

We have recently closed a seed round with Kima Ventures, one of the first in Transferwise, and Agla√© Ventures, early stage fund of the Groupe Arnault, investor in Netflix and Airbnb. Alongside them, several angel investors, who have built and sold industry leading companies have decided to take part into this journey. üöÄ

Responsibilities

Your focus will be on our backend infrastructure, from scaling challenges to data processing ones. We have an intense roadmap ahead, which includes a plethora of new features and integrations, which you will be part of. 

Our tech stack

- Google Cloud
- MySQL
- Node.js
- Kubernetes
- Docker
- Redis
- React Native

Some of our current interests lie in:

üõ† Product: We are building the 1st Finance App in the UK, used by thousands of people every day. We are shipping an average of a feature per week.

 üîÆ Machine learning: we have an enormous amount of transaction data, which we are using to provide better insights to our users. Predicting when a user is going in overdraft, when a card payment is coming through or clustering a huge set of subscriptions are a few of the problems we are tackling.

üìà Scaling: we need to keep Emma up and running. This means an intense effort and quality in the work we do. 

üèÉ‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è Speed: In this industry what really matters is speed. If we had to compare ourselves to someone, we like to think we would be Bolt.

About you:

* You are a Javascript developer with at least 5 years‚Äô experience. 
* You are fast and love to deliver incredible code.
* You can reduce complex problems to simple solutions. 
* You want to be part of an amazing team. 
* You are excited by what we're building at Emma.

Our process:

1. Phone call.
2. Take-home test. 
3. Onsite interview.

May the gummy bear power be with you!

jobs.title: Senior Mobile Developer (React Native)

Emma was founded by engineers, who are extremely focused on coding, product and data. These are the three pillars on which we want to build a strong tech culture and fix personal finance once for all. üí™

Alongside them, several angel investors, who have built and sold industry leading companies have decided to take part into this journey. üöÄ

Responsibilities

Your focus will be on our mobile app! We have an intense roadmap ahead, which includes a plethora of new features and integrations, which you will be part of.
